title.rendered: Parent Teacher meet held at Mission Education centres

content.rendered: On, 11 December organized parent teachers meeting was organized at Sirgitti, Chakarbhata and Budhwari(Navapara) Mission Education centers. Various subjected relevant about the health, hygiene, education, environment and nutrition were discussed in the meeting. Parents-teachers meetings are conducted every month in which the parents are encouraged to send their children to the centre regularly. Parents are asked to take active involvement in their child’s learning process. Child’s progress report is also shared with the parents.
